page.title: 12LEISURE IN NEWRY CONTD.
page.content: When the Swimming Club began it had 80 members.Today it has 130 members. Swimming is popular among young people and the Swimming Pool is well attended.Swimming Club members meet once a week on Wednesday night for training.Some children are able to swim 20 lengths,some 40,some 100 lengths and more in the hour.Annual membership fee is now Â£10 and members pay 30 pence each swimming session.The Club gets generous financial help from Newry and Mourne District Council.The Club has one official coach,Wilbur Lundy and several voluntary coaches.They organise inter-club galas with neighbouryn Clubs and have their own annual club gala for which there are trophies which have been donated by local firms and individual.
